summary: The diff implements all three requirements: task selection workflow with separate selected/completed tracking, default checkbox states for seven task types, and MM/DD/YYYY date formatting with auto-advance behavior. The implementation includes backend migration, new Task type structure, and comprehensive frontend updates.

hallucinated_features.description: CSV import/export functionality with comprehensive error handling and progress tracking
hallucinated_features.reason: CSV import/export was not requested in the BuildRequest. The diff adds extensive CSV functionality in CsvImportExportPanel.tsx and caseCsv.ts with import/export features, error tracking, and progress indicators.

hallucinated_features.description: Species and tasks filtering functionality in the cases list view
hallucinated_features.reason: Filtering by species or task types was not requested. The diff adds CasesSpeciesFilter and CasesTasksFilter components with session storage persistence.

hallucinated_features.description: Search and sorting functionality for cases
hallucinated_features.reason: Search and sort capabilities were not requested. The diff implements client-side search across all fields and multiple sort options (by date, by task count).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration system for data model changes
hallucinated_features.reason: While the backend data model change was necessary, the BuildRequest constraint stated 'Maintain the existing CompletedTasks data structure in the backend'. The diff replaces CompletedTasks with a new Task structure requiring migration.
